Setup Guide for a Mac

Update

This guide has been updated and is explained in the post here.

I have recently been maintaining documentation on setting up my development environment on Mac OS which can be found here. I got inspired to do this from a similar work by Nicolashery. So I started the Mac-Setup repository which was built on top of the work by Nicolas.

I keep instructions for everything I need to install on my machine for my day to day workflow. Ranging from the libraries, application and scripts. Below is a table of contents for the setup guide.

Full Instructions can be found at Mac-Setup

  • Menubar and Setting
  • Credits

Hope the guide was helpful in setting up your environment. Please let me know if you find anything wrong or just make a pull request for the mistake.
